Mi PC Suite Version：3.2.1120.13beta

Updated at：2019-03-01

File Name：

Download Links： N/A

Notes：

  1. Data calculation and compression will take place while backing up your data, the more data you have, the long it will take, so please be patient while waiting, and check notification center for any progress.
  2. 'Mi Back up' DON'T support WeChat history and files, please use WeChat's built in back up utility instead.
  3. Mi PC Suite 3.0 DOSE NOT support backing up from 2.0 Backup files.
  4. FastFlash Feature will wipe all user data, please make sure you have backed up your data.

Changelogs：

Updated at：2018-04-04

File Name：MiAssistant-3.0.330.134.exe

Download Links： MIUIROMS Files

Notes：

  1. Data calculation and compression will take place while backing up your data, the more data you have, the long it will take, so please be patient while waiting, and check notification center for any progress.
  2. 'Mi Back up' DON'T support WeChat history and files, please use WeChat's built in back up utility instead.
  3. Mi PC Suite 3.0 DOSE NOT support backing up from 2.0 Backup files.
  4. FastFlash Feature will wipe all user data, please make sure you have backed up your data.
